New Records: Mali scored early goals in both halves, highlighting their quick start and team achievement
Key Match Events: Edmond Tapsoba scored an own goal in the 3rd minute
Lassine Sinayoko scored a goal two minutes after halftime
Bertrand Traore scored a penalty after a Video Assistant Referee review
Post-Match Reflections: Mali is seeking their first Africa Cup of Nations title
Mali's strong defense was a key factor in their victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Amadou Gon Coulibaly Stadium in Korhogo, Ivory Coast
